pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the Reptile Database for Querying and Retrieving Taxonomic Data // Provides tools to search, access, and format taxonomic information from the Reptile Database (http://reptile-database.org) directly within R. Users can retrieve species-level data, distribution, etymology, synonyms, common names, and other relevant information for reptiles. Designed for taxonomists, ecologists, and biodiversity researchers.
